&ui_component_attributes; &ui_parameter_attributes;
pageflow java.lang.String a pageflow definition to begin. (This is only useful when propagation="begin" or propagation="join".)
type java.lang.String determines the conversation propagation style: begin, join, nest, none or end. "none"
